QuestData.Title: It's a Matter of Strategy
QuestData.Description: Da Iron Horde have proved themselves worthy foes.$B$BThey managed to get their fleet movin' to Talador from Gorgrond without my spies seein' a thing. Talador be a crossroads for the whole continent. We can't let them have it.$B$BDon't worry boss, we got a plan. Foreman Grobash be settin' up an outpost for our forces as we speak. They be ready for you when you arrive, commander.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Bron Skyhorn to secure a flight to Talador.
QuestData.RewardText: Your will be done. I require your advisement, commander.
